rukus.text: 21|51|mump ibrahimin tanretaya vivekam nam nalkukayuntayi. addehatte parri namukkariyamayirunnu
21|52|tanre pitavineatum tanre janannaleatum addeham iprakaram ceadicca sandarbham (srad'dheyamatre:) ninnal pujiccukeanetayirikkunna i pratimakal entakunnu
21|53|avar parannu: nannalute pitakkal ivaye aradhicc varunnatayittan nannal kantat‌
21|54|addeham parannu: tirccayayum ninnalum ninnalute pitakkalum vyaktamaya valiketilayirikkunnu
21|55|avar parannu: ni nannalute atutt satyavum keant vannirikkukayanea? atalla, ni kaliparayunnavarute kuttattilanea
21|56|addeham parannu: alla, ninnalute raksitav akasannaluteyum bhumiyuteyum raksitavakunnu. avaye srsticcuntakkiyavan. nan atin saksyam vahikkunnavarute kuttattilakunnu
21|57|allahuve tanneyana, tirccayayum ninnal pinnitt peayatin sesam nan ninnalute vigrahannalute karyattil oru tantram prayeagikkunnatan‌
21|58|annane addeham avare (daivannale) tuntam tuntamakkikkalannu. avaril orale olike. avarkk (vivaramariyanayi) ayalute atuttekk tiriccucellamallea
21|59|avar parannu: nam'mute daivannalekkeant it ceytavan aran‌? tirccayayum avan akramikalil pettavan tanneyan‌
21|60|cilar parannu: ibrahim enn vilikkappetunna oru ceruppakkaran a daivannalepparri paramarsikkunnat nannal kettint‌
21|61|avar parannu: ennal ninnal avane janannalute kanmumpil keant varu. avar saksyam vahiccekkam
21|62|avar ceadiccu: ibrahime, niyanea nannalute daivannalekkeant itu ceytat‌
21|63|addeham parannu: ennal avarute kuttattile i valiyavanan at ceytat‌. avar sansarikkumenkil ninnal avareat ceadicc neakku
21|64|appeal avar svamanas'sakalilekk tanne matanni. ennittavar (an'yean'yam) parannu: tirccayayum ninnal tanneyan akramakarikal
21|65|pinne avar talakuttane marinnu. (avar parannu:) ivar sansarikkukayillenn ninakkariyamallea
21|66|addeham parannu: appeal ninnalkk yatearu upakaramea upadravamea ceyyatta vastukkale allahuvin purame ninnal aradhikkukayanea
21|67|ninnaluteyum, allahuvin purame ninnal aradhikkunnavaruteyum karyam apahasyam tanne. ninnal cintikkunnille
21|68|avar parannu: ninnalkk (vallatum) ceyyanakumenkil ninnal ivane cuttericc kalayukayum, ninnalute daivannale sahayikkukayum ceyyuka
21|69|nam parannu: tiye, ni ibrahimin tanuppum samadhanavumayirikkuka
21|70|addehattinre karyattil oru tantram prayeagikkuvan avar uddesiccu. ennal avare erravum nastam parriyavarakkukayan nam ceytat‌
21|71|leakarkk venti nam anugrhitamakkiveccittulla oru bhupradesattekk addehatteyum lutvineyum nam raksappetuttikkeant peakukayum ceytu
21|72|addehattin nam isakhine pradanam ceytu. purame (petran) ya'akhubineyum. avareyellam nam sad‌vrttarakkiyirikkunnu

21|73|avare nam nam'mute kalpanaprakaram margadarsanam nalkunna netakkalakkukayum ceytu. nalla karyannal ceyyanamennum, namaskaram murapeale nirvahikkanamennum, sakatt nalkanamennum nam avarkk beadhanam nalkukayum ceytu. nam'meyayirunnu avar aradhiccirunnat‌

21|74|lutvin nam vidhikarttrtvavum vijnanavum nalkukayuntayi. durvrttikal ceytukeantirunna a nattil ninn addehatte nam raksappetuttukayum ceytu. tirccayayum avar (nattukar) dhikkarikalaya oru dusicca janatayayirunnu
21|75|nam'mute karunyattil addehatte nam ulpetuttukayum ceytu. tirccayayum addeham sad‌vrttarute kuttattilakunnu
